Initializer# init(fovyRadians:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:)

iOS 16.0–18.0DeprecatediPadOS 16.0–18.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 16.0–18.0DeprecatedmacOS 13.0–15.0DeprecatedtvOS 16.0–18.0DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0–2.0DeprecatedwatchOS 9.0–11.0Deprecated

```
init(
    fovyRadians: Double,
    aspectRatio: Double,
    nearZ: Double,
    farZ: Double
)
```

Deprecated

Use `SPAngle` variant of `SPProjectiveTransform3DMakeWithRightHandPerspective`.

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3D/init(fovyRadians:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:)#parameters)

`fovyRadians`The field of view angle on the @p y axis.

`aspectRatio`The aspect ratio.

`nearZ`The near @p z .

`farZ`The far @p z .

## [Return Value](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3D/init(fovyRadians:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:)#return-value)

A projective transform with right-hand side perspective.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3D/init(fovyRadians:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:)#discussion)

Returns a projective transform with right-hand side perspective.

## [See Also](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3D/init(fovyRadians:aspectRatio:nearZ:farZ:)#see-also)
